mapper.update: update baobiao_alarmhandleresult set is_deleted = 1 where ifnull(is_deleted,0)=0 and baojingid = #{baojingid}
mapper.select: select id, baojingid, baojingleixing, remark, chulizhuangtai, chulixingshi, chulimiaoshu, chulirenid, chuliren, chulishijian, fujian, beizhu, qiyemingcheng, qiyeid, cheliangpaizhao, chepaiyanse, hedingrenyuan, hedingrenyuanid, hedingshijian, shensushenheren, shensushenheshijian, shensushenhebiaoshi, shensusudu, is_deleted from baobiao_alarmhandleresult where baojingid=#{baojingid} and IFNULL(is_deleted,'')!=1 AND remark = 1 order by chulishijian desc limit 1
SELECT * FROM baobiao_alarmhandleresult WHERE baojingid = #{id} AND is_deleted = 0 AND baojingleixing = #{baojingleixing}

select a.AlarmType, COUNT(1) as number, CONCAT(#{date},'至',left(now(),10)) as times from( SELECT a.AlarmReportID, b.dept_id, a.AlarmType FROM baobiao_alarmsummary_cutofftime a, (select id,dept_id from anbiao_vehicle) b where 1=1
and CutoffTime >= CONCAT( left(#{date},10), ' 00:00:00') and CutoffTime <= CONCAT( left(now(),10), ' 23:59:59')
and CutoffTime >= CONCAT( #{date}, ' 00:00:00') and CutoffTime < CONCAT( left(now(),10), ' 23:59:59')
and CutoffTime >= CONCAT( #{date}, ' 00:00:00') and CutoffTime < CONCAT( left(now(),10), ' 00:00:00')
and b.dept_id = #{deptId} and a.AlarmType in('超速报警','疲劳驾驶报警','夜间行驶报警','不定位报警','无数据报警','24小时不在线报警','高速禁行报警') and passed = 100 and AnalyzeMode = 1 and a.VehId = b.id
and timestampdiff(day,CONCAT( left(CutoffTime,10), ' 00:00:00'),CONCAT( left(now(),10), ' 00:00:00')) > 7
and timestampdiff(day,CONCAT( left(CutoffTime,10), ' 00:00:00'),CONCAT( left(now(),10), ' 00:00:00')) > 5 and timestampdiff(day,CONCAT( left(CutoffTime,10), ' 00:00:00'),CONCAT( left(now(),10), ' 00:00:00')) < 8
) a LEFT JOIN baobiao_alarmhandleresult b on a.AlarmReportID=b.baojingid and a.dept_id = b.qiyeid and (a.AlarmType=b.baojingleixing or b.baojingleixing = '异常车辆报警') WHERE b.baojingid is null GROUP BY AlarmType

SELECT COUNT(1) as number, AlarmType, CONCAT(#{date},'至',left(now(),10)) as times from ( select a.*, b.baojingid from( SELECT * FROM baobiao_driverbehavior WHERE cid = #{deptId}
and GpsTime >= CONCAT( left( #{date} ,10), ' 00:00:00') and GpsTime <= CONCAT( left(now(),10), ' 23:59:59')
and GpsTime >= CONCAT( #{date}, ' 00:00:00') and GpsTime < CONCAT( left(now(),10), ' 23:59:59')
and GpsTime >= CONCAT( #{date}, ' 00:00:00') and GpsTime < CONCAT( left(now(),10), ' 00:00:00')
and timestampdiff(day,CONCAT( left(GpsTime,10), ' 00:00:00'),CONCAT( left(now(),10), ' 00:00:00')) > 7
and timestampdiff(day,CONCAT( left(GpsTime,10), ' 00:00:00'),CONCAT( left(now(),10), ' 00:00:00')) > 5 and timestampdiff(day,CONCAT( left(GpsTime,10), ' 00:00:00'),CONCAT( left(now(),10), ' 00:00:00')) < 8
) a LEFT JOIN baobiao_alarmhandleresult b on a.id=b.baojingid and a.AlarmType=b.baojingleixing WHERE b.baojingid is null and a.stateEx='核定报警' and a.AlarmType in('接打电话报警','分神驾驶报警','抽烟报警','生理疲劳报警','驾驶员异常报警') ) ab GROUP BY AlarmType
SELECT id FROM baobiao_baobiaomulu WHERE dept_id = #{deptId} AND countdate =#{date} LIMIT 1

select COUNT(a.alarmreportid) as alarmCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN b.chulizhuangtai is not null THEN 1 END) as handledCount from baobiao_alarmsummary_cutofftime as a left join ( select a.id,a.dept_id from anbiao_vehicle a ) v on a.VehId = v.id left join baobiao_alarmhandleresult as b on a.alarmreportid = b.baojingid and v.dept_id = b.qiyeid and (a.AlarmType=b.baojingleixing or b.baojingleixing = '异常车辆报警') and ifnull(b.is_deleted,0) = 0 where 1=1 and a.passed = 100 and a.AnalyzeMode = 1 and a.cutoffTime >= CONCAT( #{date}, ' 00:00:00') and a.cutoffTime <= CONCAT( #{date}, ' 23:59:59') and v.dept_id = (select id from blade_dept where dept_name = #{company} and is_deleted = 0)

select COUNT(a.id) as alarmCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN b.chulizhuangtai is not null THEN 1 END) as handledCount from baobiao_driverbehavior as a left join baobiao_alarmhandleresult as b on a.id = b.baojingid and a.AlarmType=b.baojingleixing and ifnull(b.is_deleted,0) = 0 where 1=1 and GpsTime >= CONCAT( #{date}, ' 00:00:00') and GpsTime <= CONCAT( #{date}, ' 23:59:59') AND company=#{company} and stateEx ='核定报警'
mapper.update: update baobiao_alarmhandleresult set twicechulixingshi = #{twicechulixingshi}, twicechulimiaoshu = #{twicechulimiaoshu}, twicechuliren = #{twicechuliren}, twicechulishijian = #{twicechulishijian}, twicechulirenid = #{twicechulirenid}, twicefujian = #{twicefujian}, endresult = 1 where baojingid = #{id}
